name: Tabs
description: Tabbed navigation primitives with lists and panes.

use: you need a complete tab system with list + content.
avoid: you only need the tab headers (use `tab_list`).

examples.minimal:
Tabs(
  index: 0,
  onChanged: (index) {},
  tabs: const [
    TabItem(child: Text('Tab 1')),
    TabItem(child: Text('Tab 2')),
  ],
  children: const [
    TabChildWidget(child: Text('Content 1')),
    TabChildWidget(child: Text('Content 2')),
  ],
)

theming: `TabsTheme` controls borders, spacing, and text styles.
accessibility: Ensure active tab is announced and focusable.
dont: Use too many tabs for narrow layouts.
